measurements_data.comments: Food/organic reported as a range of 35-45 percent; wood 2-6 percent; paper/carboard 10-25 percent; plastic 1-4 percent; glass  2-4 percent; metal 1-3 percent; rubber/leather 1-2 percent; and other includes textile (2-5 percent) and other inert (10-18 percent) waste (average used for all ranges)
